header.gameNote: LAS VEGAS INVITATIONAL AT LAS VEGAS NV

article.headline: Valparaiso 76, N. Colorado 61
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Howard Little scored 18 points to lead Valparaiso in a comeback victory over Northern Colorado 76-61 in the third round of the Las Vegas Invitational on Friday. Little, who was 4 of 5 from 3-point range, had 14 second-half points as Valparaiso (3-2) rallied from an 11-point first-half deficit and outscored the Bears (2-3) in the second half, 50-29. Ryan Broekhoff added 15 points and Matt Kenney added 11 for the Crusaders, who will play Texas A&M-Corpus Christi in the final round on Saturday. Devon Beitzel led Northern Colorado with 23 points, including 4 of 6 from 3-point range and 9 of 9 from the free-throw line. Emmanuel Addo added 12 points and 9 rebounds for the Bears, who will play Bethune-Cookman in the final round on Saturday. In the second half, Valparaiso made 15 of 23 from the field, compared to 6 of 26 in the first.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
